message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay closer to $100 for this product. Would you be willing to come down a little?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
